label: Measurement
comment: An amount, size, or extent as established by measuring.

datatypeProperties.comment: An actual measure for this measurement.
A code specifying the operator, such as, less than, greater than or equal to, for comparing two actual measures.
A measure of a condition for this measurement.
A measurement method expressed as text.

referencedBy.comment: A measurement associated with this document clause.
The measurement of the control temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
The measurement of the emergency temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
A measurement of the flashpoint temperature of these transported dangerous goods.
